description: Here's a cocktail that will warm you up on winter days, whether in winter or summer. This smoky, herbaceous drink is complex and aromatic, with a subtle blend of&nbsp;mezcal, Cynar, and Chartreuse. At the same time, the lemon juice and simple syrup gives a nice balance to the cocktail, while egg white adds silkiness and weight.
name: Smoke Show
